all_job_data.title: SAP FICO Consultant
requirements: Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Finance, Accounting, Information Technology, or a related field.
Minimum 8+ years of experience in SAP FICO implementation and support.

Extensive knowledge of SAP FI (General Ledger, Accounts Payable, Accounts Receivable, Asset Accounting) and CO (Cost Center Accounting, Profit Center Accounting, Internal Orders, Product Costing) on both S/4 HANA and ECC platforms.
Proven experience in SAP S/4 HANA and Fiori.
Strong understanding of financial and management accounting principles.
Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills.
Strong project management and leadership skills.
Effective communication and interpersonal skills.
Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
SAP certification in FI/CO is a plus.
responsibilities: Lead and manage greenfield S/4HANA implementation projects from inception to completion.
Design and configure SAP FICO modules for both S/4 HANA and ECC platforms.
Have worked at least in 2 E2E implementations.
Be able to articulate well with the customers.
Cloud experience is additional advantage.
Conduct requirement gathering sessions and workshops with clients.
Develop functional specifications for custom developments and enhancements.
Perform system testing, integration testing, and support user acceptance testing (UAT).
Facilitate data migration and system integration activities.
Analyze and optimize business processes within the SAP FICO framework.
Collaborate with other SAP modules and IT teams to ensure seamless integration and data consistency.
Create and maintain detailed documentation for system configurations, processes, and user guides.
Conduct training sessions and workshops for end-users and junior consultants.
Ensure knowledge transfer to client teams and internal stakeholders.
Lead and manage SAP FICO projects from inception to completion.
Develop project plans, timelines, and resource allocations.
Coordinate with clients, stakeholders, and project teams to ensure successful project delivery.
Stay updated with the latest SAP FICO developments, best practices, and industry trends.
Identify opportunities for system enhancements and process improvements.
Participate in SAP user groups and forums to share knowledge and learn from peers.
all_job_data.description: About the Role: As an SAP FICO Consultant L4 to join our dynamic team, the ideal candidate will have a strong background in SAP Financial Accounting (FI) with extensive experience in greenfield S/4HANA implementations. You will play a critical role in the implementation, configuration, and support of SAP Financial Accounting (FI) and Controlling (CO) modules on both S/4 HANA and ECC platforms. Your expertise will ensure that business requirements are met with robust and scalable SAP solutions. This role demands extensive experience with both SAP ECC and S/4 HANA, strong problem-solving skills, and the ability to lead and manage complex projects.

all_job_data.title: Senior SAP FI CO Consultant (with Product Costing experience)
requirements: Strong background in Finance and Accounting with technical expertise across SAP FI, CO, Product Costing and PS

Fully conversant with SAP Finance solutions, specifically SAP FI, CO, Product Costing and PS
Good understanding of cross-module integration with MM, SD, PP, HR and QM
S/4HANA exposure with S4Finance and Activate delivery methodology

Provides specialist subject matter expertise in line with the solution

Delivers utilisation in line with targets
Delivers against a resource plan which drives personal and company utilisation
Identifies further opportunities for revenue
Acts as a specialist within the consulting group by attaining and sharing best practice, knowledge and skills
Is a mentor to less experienced team members to support their professional development and personal performance
Maintains an up to date knowledge and zest for the latest trends and utilizes this understanding to bring innovation to our ways of working
Travel to client sites as part of project delivery

all_job_data.title: Senior SAP FI Consultant
requirements: Subject Matter Expert for SAP FI Module
Minimum of 3-7 years experience in SAP FI functional Development and Support
SAP implementation experience for specific FI module, full project lifecycle
Solid experience of systems development and project management methodologies
In deep understanding of the processes in SAP ECC Financial modules: SAP GL, AP, AR, AA, Banks, CO
In-depth knowledge of SAP FI module functionalities, configuration, and integration with other SAP modules

Experience with design, implementation and testing processes. Working on these areas to define business processes, solving the gaps, improving the flows, transforming the business requirements into system specifications to meet current and future requirements
Solid understanding and experience of integrating SAP GL modules with other modules like MM, SD, PM and FICO sub-modules
Good knowledge of RO specific legislation (SAF-T, e-factura, etc.)
Experience in designing, implementing and managing processes for interfacing and data transfer between SAP and other applications
Strong knowledge of Business Processes
Worked before on IT projects
Good communication skills
Great attention to detail, well organized, team player, problem-solving, decision-making, result orientation, resilience, presentation skills, analytical thinking, people-management, goal-orientation
Ability to work in a complex environment, handling various types of tasks in the financial area and its integration with other systems and/or solutions
A landscape overview of the retail processes starting from the store to the financial processes would be a plus
English language knowledge is a must
Traveling on site in Romania, if required
Nice to have: IFRS knowledge, Plant maintenance, Investment management, Real estate modules, experience on SAP 4 HANA implementation
responsibilities: Design & deliver technical/functional solutions against specifications and blueprints in accordance with agreed standards and procedures

Design processes and planning, will offer support for the documentation and the implementation of the new functionalities ‚Äì improvements on the existing for creating new flows, implementing new projects at local or regional level
Complete unit and integration testing of developments in line with agreed processes ensuring completion within allocated timescales
Communicate internally with business users and externally with other entities

Collaborate with all teams within IT department, local business and regional teams to solve the issues and to reduce their impact, to detect all the dependencies for the new requirements and to anticipate all flows involved, to plan correctly the process and to unlock the blockages
Complete detailed solution documentation for functional solutions
Provide technical expertise in systems applications within a nominated function
Provide solutions for different issues on the financial flows, and for the maintenance of the data transfer in SAP through various applications
Involved in staff training
Continuously improve our implementation methodology
Focused on delivering multiple projects at the same time
Undertake any other reasonable duties and responsibilities as may be required
Maintain a high level of functionality for the financial processes in the company
all_job_data.description: Who we are: Join one of the biggest SAP Teams in Romania and work with the latest technologies and tools. We are looking for a skilled and experienced SAP FI consultant to join our team, being involved in local or international projects, collaborating with diverse teams. The role involves designing, delivering, testing and implementing SAP FI solutions, coordinating with IT and business stakeholders, and maintaining financial processes within SAP.
benefits: New beginnings can be a challenge. We promise a smooth integration and a supportive mentor
Pick your working style: Remote, Hybrid or Office work opportunities
Early bird or night owl? Our projects have different working hours to suit your needs
Sponsored certifications, trainings and top e-learning platforms
Private Health Insurance ‚Äì customized for you
Individual coaching sessions or Coaching School
Epic parties or themed events for employees and families

What you'll be doing
¬†

Design & deliver technical/functional solutions against specifications and blueprints in accordance with agreed standards and procedures
Design processes and planning, will offer support for the documentation and the implementation of the new functionalities ‚Äì improvements on the existing for creating new flows, implementing new projects at local or regional level
Complete unit and integration testing of developments in line with agreed processes ensuring completion within allocated timescales
Communicate internally with business users and externally with other entities
Collaborate with all teams within IT department, local business and regional teams to solve the issues and to reduce their impact, to detect all the dependencies for the new requirements and to anticipate all flows involved, to plan correctly the process and to unlock the blockages
Complete detailed solution documentation for functional solutions
Provide technical expertise in systems applications within a nominated function
Provide solutions for different issues on the financial flows, and for the maintenance of the data transfer in SAP through various applications
Involved in staff training
Continuously improve our implementation methodology
Focused on delivering multiple projects at the same time
Undertake any other reasonable duties and responsibilities as may be required
Maintain a high level of functionality for the financial processes in the company

¬†
What you'll bring along
¬†

Subject Matter Expert for SAP FI Module
Minimum of 3-7 years experience in SAP FI functional Development and Support
SAP implementation experience for specific FI module, full project lifecycle
Solid experience of systems development and project management methodologies
In deep understanding of the processes in SAP ECC Financial modules: SAP GL, AP, AR, AA, Banks, CO
In-depth knowledge of SAP FI module functionalities, configuration, and integration with other SAP modules
Experience with design, implementation and testing processes
